dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr Andrew S Kanter gave this presentation at the December 12 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group Dr Kanter is an Asst Prof in Clinical Biomedical Informatics and Clinical Epidemiology at Columbia University and served as the Director of Health Information Systems Medical Informatics for the Millennium Villages Project at the Earth Institute from 2006 2012 Dr Kanter s presentation is on the Millennium Villages Global Network MVG Net a comprehensive open source e health delivery platform enabling facility based data capture community based data capture of individual level data data storage of patient health records automated mechanism for aggregating data and generating reports and feedback to healthcare providers and managers MVG Net included multiple e mHealth tools including OpenMRS CommcareODK ChildCount and others
Global m/eHealth: An example using the Millennium Villages Global Network (MVG-Net)
